v.
John Lance REESE, Peter Peters and Mitzi Peters, as Trustees of the Peters Living Trust Dated September 9, 2010, Appellees. The City of Gulf Breeze, Appellant,
v.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION
